# Global Backsliding .tiny[(Autocratization)] Trend (V-dem data)

--

```{r, fig.width=14.5, fig.height=7, fig.align='center'}

library(ERT)


data <- get_eps() %>%
  select(c("aut_ep", "country_name", "year")) %>%
  filter(year>1949)


data %>%
  ggplot(aes(x=year)) +
  geom_bar(aes(fill=factor(aut_ep)), 
           stat = 'count',
           alpha=0.75) +
  labs(fill = "autocratization") +
  theme_minimal() + 
  scale_fill_manual(labels = c("No", "Yes"),
                    values = c("blue", "red")) +
  theme(text = element_text(size = 25))
```

--

## 1. Underlying factors doing the groundwork
--

  - .Large[Financial crises]
--

  - .Large[inequality, globalization, technological change]	
--

  - .Large[Racial, ethnic, cultural divides]

--

## 2. Drastic .pink[polarization] completing the process

--

  - .Large[Opens up a political opportunity for an autocrat]
--

  - .Large[Legislative compliance]
--

  - .Large[Party fragmentation]
